website_summaries.verdict: Despite a few question marks and a high price, the Bose SoundLink Around-Ear Bluetooth Headphones are a very good-sounding Bluetooth pair that's lightweight and very comfortable to wear.
pros: The Bose SoundLink Around-Ear Bluetooth Headphones offer very good sound for Bluetooth, and they're arguably the most comfortable over-the-ear Bluetooth model
The control module is also well designed, with well-placed buttons that can be operated easily by feel alone
cons: protruding Bluetooth module looks a little strange
volume may not be loud enough for some people, depending on device used and type of file played

customer_reviews.title: Great even though a bit pricey.
customer_reviews.text: Other than price these are great! I purchased these headphones after a poor experience with another brand of Bluetooth headphones. These were far better! The sound was quite good and the fit was great. I was originally concerned the weight of these phones might make them uncomfortable with lengthy use. However, after over 2 hours of use I did not even notice them being on. The sound volume was sufficiently loud enough to exceed my standards. I have had no complaints from family members about sound leakage (which I read about in a review I saw before I purchased them). They are a bit pricey (aren't all Bose products) but well worth the price given the performance. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Wally Dut

customer_reviews.title: Would be great but poor range / reception...
customer_reviews.text: Everything about these is great except that they only have a range of a few feet... They seem to be very sensitive to interference and are often choppy. I've used these in my house, on planes, and in hotels with my TV, laptop, and phone... I like everything about them except for the fact that they just don't function as well as they should. I am about 10 feet from my TV right now and they are basically unusable... If I tilt my head just right I can get reception, otherwise they just continually cut out. I think that Bose skimped by using a small detachable BT receiver (it is actually removable!).
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Niemeyer

customer_reviews.title: non replaceable internal batteries make the product obsolete prematurely
customer_reviews.text: The Bose sound quality, noise cancellation and volume control are all excellent when the product is new. After a certain amount of product use and battery recharge cycles, the rechargeable internal batteries can no longer be charged and cannot be replaced. The product is then prematurely obsolete. Not satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Luikens

customer_reviews.title: The wireless feature is a treasure and the option to take calls is a great bonus feature.
customer_reviews.text: I also have Bose in-ear noise canceling headphones. They are more comfortable, but wired, and I wanted a wireless set and these fit the bill. Sound quality is quite nice, which one expects from Bose products, and the microphone is handy for taking phone calls. So far, there have been no complaints about how I sound to the people I've talked to that way. Also bought an after-market case and a retractable charger. Overall, I was pleased enough to buy the same set (headphones, case, and retractable charger) for the DH as a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Not Cordelia

customer_reviews.title: Great for Music
customer_reviews.text: when listening to music I love these headphones, they're light and have great sound. the sound quality is great via bluetooth or when connected with the cable (on an airplane). The battery lasts a good amount of time (can't remember specifics) and charges to a full charge in only a few hours. my only real complaint about these is the microphone when on a phone call. I would have expected from Bose a better microphone that would filter out the ambient sound around me, or the wind blowing. the microphone picks up everything, so I typically don't use them if someone calls me.
customer_reviews.author: hilde

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones
customer_reviews.text: I have tried and bought my fair share of headphones. Over the ear, in the ear, you name it I have tried them. I like the ability to switch from bluetooth to hard line if needed. The instructions are very simple. Mostly pictograms. The sound clarity is fairly decent. These headphones are light weight and very portable. One bummer is the need of a USB port to charge them. You can purchase an optional wall charger, which I probably will. Since I am not always near a USB port. Compared to other bluetooth headphones like Rhio, and others the quality is superior all around.
customer_reviews.author: Ghostrider75

customer_reviews.title: Gave them to my wife as a gift - she loves them
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Easy to set up (to Ipad and iphone) - Good quality sound for a bluetooth connection - Holds the charge well. - Comfortable / adjustable. Cons: - A bit warm on my ears ... but my wife loves them. Its more a question of personal preference. - They feel a bit "cheap" but probably because they are so light. We'll see with time ... - Price ... I think this is overpriced a bit - 199 would have been more appropriate. Have not tried to swap between phone/ipad with an incoming call much yet - will have to see how that works out...
customer_reviews.author: Zip

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and easy hook-up.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, these are great! Each to hook up to my iPhone and the blotch transmitter I purchased for watching TV and DVDs. They do keep outside sound out to an amazing degree. I find the quality of sound they deliver is excellent. Listening to some music I have had for month/years I am beginning to hear aspects I have never heard before, perhaps because of surrounding sounds from speakers or the fact that stereo is delivered to each ear appropriately. Whatever. They are wonderful and making me really happy to have bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Falcon

customer_reviews.title: Sync issues started in 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Previously worked great then 6 months into ownership this thing has bluetooth sync issue with my only device (ipad) that it's suppose to sync to. It would drop in/out of sync in the middle of movie/music track while having half to full charge on battery. Done all I can in re-sync, update my own device regularly, etc.. but I come to accept you get what you paid for and may have to spend double to get a better headphone set.
customer_reviews.author: Domo

customer_reviews.title: Bose--Synonymous With Quality for a Reason
customer_reviews.text: Bose quality--great sound, worth every cent. I travel every week and decided it was time to upgrade my headset. I have been using Bose earbuds...also highly recommended. These are the most comfortable headphones I've ever had. They are lightweight and fit into a carry pouch so small I can slip them into my briefcase--I check my luggage. I've two weeks off for the holidays, then it's up, up, and away again. With these--very easy bluetooth pairing--I'm ready for my next 150,000 miles.
customer_reviews.author: Pierce

customer_reviews.title: If you're looking for a good well-rounded great sounding cordless headphones and I would give ...
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding Bluetooth headphones. I get a kick out of the reviews that say while they can't do this or can't do that, light the midrange, high-end is a little too high, low and is a little too low. I'm 68 years old in the days of looking for headphones that will be 20 to 20,000 kHz plus or minus one db are over as far as I'm concerned. If you're looking for a good well-rounded great sounding cordless headphones and I would give these strong consideration. I've enjoyed them every minute I've used them and they are joy to own.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound, the blue tooth works very well. The fit over the ears is very comfortable, the swivel joints on the head band give it freedom to form fit to your head. The only thing I don't like is that you cannot charge the head phones while you are using them. Oh, one more comment: The blue tooth device unplugs from the ear phones, and nothing shows you what direction to pull on it to remove it (you pull down, the mini stereo jack axis is vertical).
customer_reviews.author: et

customer_reviews.title: Bose Bluetooth headphones @ a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I luv these headphones! Easy setup and sound quality very good considering it's Bluetooth. I'm not experiencing any discomfort as noted from other posted reviews. However, I do experience some connection issues while moving away from connected device. The distance isn't really that far and it could be interference since I do have many wireless devices. My apartment is only 1100 sq feet, other than the "brief" interruption issues, I still like the device. The real test will be at work. I will follow up later.
customer_reviews.author: iCastle

customer_reviews.title: A+++ Great Headphones !!!!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite headset I have ever owned, worth every penny. I use them about everyday in office, hotel rooms, and at home. Worked great on a plane trip to Hawaii. Sound quality is up to Bose standards. I've tried the beats and these are lighter with a cleaner and more precise clear sound. Their also much more comfortable. Only down side is I wish they had a hard carry case, I take them around in my business backpack with all my other stuff (laptop, tablet, etc..) they've held up fine but still wish they had a better case.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Love Bose, but no case?
customer_reviews.text: Comfort - 5 stars - lightweight, don't pinch, not too big, and don't get hot. Appearance - 4 stars - the bluetooth dongle just doesn't seem necessary, but maybe that design is what keeps them lightweight. Sound quality - I'll defer to the audiophiles but it is the great sound and noise cancelling I've come to expect from Bose. Case - I guess they're cutting costs; they came with no case! I got the, which fit the headphones really well and provides way more protection then my QC 15 case.
customer_reviews.author: TruthfulFeedback

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal set of Bluetooth headphones
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely happy with these. The reasons: 1. Fantastic sound. 2. Unbelievably light. I know they were marketed as being light, but when I picked them up they were much lighter than I expected. 3. Controls are easy to use. 4. They are over the ear but still small, so they will be good for travel.
customer_reviews.author: HomerJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Bose headphones
customer_reviews.text: Maybe the best bluetooth headphones in the market today. These are really comfortable, and I can wear them all day at the office without any problems. The battery last about 8 hours, which is fine for all day at work. The sound is superb, as most of the Bose products deliver, and the quality is great too. And to top all that, it is great if you have an iPad or iPhone, as it can handle phone calls or FaceTime perfectly. I strongly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: CGDM

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is the third set of these headphones that i have tried and all three have had some type of technical problem (i.e. the bluetooth keeps disconnecting from my iPhone, the battery doesn't fully charge even after leaving it on the charger overnight, etc.). I thought the third time would 'be the charm,' but....nope. i'm switching to something else. at this point, at this price point, i'm thinking that Bose is living off of it's name, not it's quality.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Hilgeman

customer_reviews.title: Greatest feature is getting Deezer for 50% off
customer_reviews.text: Greatest feature is getting Deezer for 50% off. If you listen to Spotify or anything similar check out deezer. It is only $4.99 a month when you buy these headphones. Worth it in the $60 a year saving for streaming music!!!! I want to use these for skyping. The audio quality really goes down when using the mic. Literally unusable. It is really unfortunate because these headphones are really comfortable and the sound quality without using the mic is very good. THe audio quality suffers in phone calls too with my smartphone.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Picone

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, with one caveat-
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic, but with one caveat- you really have to go wired with these for the gym or very noisy places because the volume with the bluetooth attachment is just not quite there. However, for inside your home or most places where noise is not a real issue they are fantastic. These are so lightweight, with the bluetooth piece or with the wire, it's unreal. With the wire you can workout, go running, use them in loud places and they work well.
customer_reviews.author: RobertSC

customer_reviews.title: After reading review after review, comparing one to the ...
customer_reviews.text: After reading review after review, comparing one to the other, corded verses corless, I decided despite people commenting on their displeasure about lack of volume to purchase these for my husband! It was the right decision! I can't turn the volume all the way up neither can he! It's just to loud! So maybe if you have some hearing damage ( lol) you might have an issue! The quality of sound beats the other popular brands by far! I tried them
customer_reviews.author: Kim G.

customer_reviews.title: The charge lasts 8 hours which is a normal work day for me which is great. The only issue I've had so far is ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use for work so that I can take calls and still have quality sound when I'm listening to music when calls don't come in. The charge lasts 8 hours which is a normal work day for me which is great. The only issue I've had so far is just a bluetooth issue. I had to resync it with my computer and my phone because too many things were connected to it. I think that was the issue and I just held the talk button and the - button to reset it.
customer_reviews.author: JK Carter

customer_reviews.title: Regrettable Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Sound isn't great from the get go but it does the job. Wireless is fairly easy to connect each time, but after 7 months of light usage, the right ear is now very quiet on wireless (not on direct plug in). Should have returned it when I had the chance since it's not great sound quality for Bose...
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: This was my first Bose purchase and I am glad I spent the extra money for these! Although they are not noise canceling, when I wear them they block most of my two young boys out! Enough to easily fall asleep. I listen to country music and talk radio programs; they both never sounded better. For those who like really loud music, I am sorry to say that this pair of Bose may not be for you. Shipping was great, arrived a day early and well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Best headset I ever bot
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best headphones I have ever bot. It's Bluetooth. Links to 2 devices at same time. It's a headset for phone. Has some noise canceling, so it's easier to hear music. It's light weight so u can wear it for hrs with out fatigue. Oh and u can remove Bluetooth module and use headset as a wired one. I listen to Bluetooth music at construction sites. Then I go home and switched to wire mode and play on computer or ps4. Oh and did I say music sounds great
customer_reviews.author: Starfez

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: Look, I am not an audiophile so if you would like to hear a review from one, then you should move on. I was looking for a pair of over the ear wireless headphones that I could use at work. These are exactly what I wanted. The wireless connection works well so that I can stream from my Mac, iPad, and iPhone. The sound quality is very nice to my ears and the headphones are light and comfortable. I did purchase an accessory case to protect these from my 5 y/o son. In my opinion, these are work the price!
customer_reviews.author: Willie Davis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bluetooth headphones for Music Lovers
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Beats Solo HD and as it was not bluetooth I decided to buy BOSE, and boy I am glad I made that decision. Awesome product with bluetooth capability. You can pair 10 devices to the headset, sound quality is just awesome and the best part it is portable as its bluetooth. You dont need to carry your phone or ipod with you all the time. The range of bluetooth is also good and so is the charging. Smart design of BOSE also lets you plug in the Cable if you run out of juice on the unit. Perfect for someone who is on the run :)
customer_reviews.author: Harpreet S.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: I just got this a couple of hours ago. Out of the box, paired it up, tryed them on- lite and comfortable and there it was- Bose!!!!!!!! and wireless. Clear wonderful perfect sound. Walked into the bedroom- could still here it like I was in the same room as the T.V.. It does not get to much better. They are charging now to be able to watch a movie tonight with out having to worry about bothering any one. I love you Bose and I love you Amazon.com
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: I like these very much
customer_reviews.text: I like these very much. I wear them when sewing. I see that Bose has improved them in the short time since I bought them. I called to see if there is an upgrade path, as had been so generously provided on my sound canceling. Alas, no upgrade path yet. But these area awesome now! The sound is good and they are very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Robbi Eklow

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I'm missing is an extra dongle so I could stay wireless always. I'm no stranger to Bose and have been a fan of their products for quiet some time now. I didn't expect a pair of wireless headphones to work or sound as good as these do. I also love the fact that they 1. made the dongle (instead of a completely built in system) and 2. include a chord that you can utilize while the dongle is recharging. Like I said all I need to know is how can I pick up an extra dongle and everything would be peachy!
customer_reviews.author: mike31jmb

customer_reviews.title: Buy a Bose
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is superb. Ease of use is very easy even fos a none techy like me. After two months of use the battery pack failed but I was able to use the headphones with the wire connector that came with the system. The best part was when I talked to technical support, they were very helpful and had a replacement battery pack sent out by UPS immediately. You want good sound quality and excellent tech support, get a Bose.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Bose makes a great gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for a friend. He loves it and said he uses it everyday. (No one would reject Bose if they don't need to pay for it). I just saved you the trouble of going into the in-depth reviews of this product if you are getting this as a gift. Check out for the newer model if you can afford it though (it looks much cooler).
customer_reviews.author: Lotsopop

customer_reviews.title: Throw Them Away Now . . .
customer_reviews.text: Shortage in blue tooth/charging unit renders them useless. They're not cheap and I especially have expectation for Bose products. I tried a few things to no avail . . . pulling it off and reinserting . . . nail file to gently remove any possible debris . . . nope = throw them away now.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable, easy to use, charge lasted through a 4 hour bus ride and a 4 hour train ride. Battery status shows up on my phone, which is super helpful. The sound could go louder, as other reviewers said, but for me this is an advantage because I think I would listen at damaging volumes if I could. The call quality is great, I actually prefer using these over my little Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: these speakers are awesome! the only two flaws is that it doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: these speakers are awesome! the only two flaws is that it doesn't cancel outside noise but i knew that. The reason its getting four stars is due to the bluetooth not working properly. It worked great at first and then started getting to the point where you couldn't be two to three feet away from it without it not working so i returned and got a new pair and it seems to be working fine so far
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband so he could watch Netflix on his iPad/PC while he folds the laundry (I have never had all the laundry clean and folded so promptly the way it has been since "House of Cards!") He reports that the sound is great. They get a little warm and heavy (might not be as bad if one was sitting still.) They connected to his iPad very easily. A little more challenging for the PC - he had to purchase a special bluetooth adaptor and still hasn't figured out how to get it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia K McKay

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love the wireless headphones by my favorite company Bose!! Comfortable, they're not canceling, but it's all the same, I can't hear NOTHING with them on! The sound is GREAT as usual with Bose! I ride the train to work everyday and it travels underground a lot....I lose connectivity for a second or two while underground, but other than that, I LOVE THEM!!
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Pairs with multiple devices easily. Controls
customer_reviews.text: Comfort: They're ok. I can wear them for about an hour before I start to notice my ears getting sore. Sound: Not on par with the Bose QC15s that I replaced. Not loud enough. Bluetooth: Pairs with multiple devices easily. Controls: easy to use, easy to locate without looking. Look: Kinda goofy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Duncan

customer_reviews.title: My son loves these
customer_reviews.text: My son sold his beets to a friend to buy these. The sound quality is great. I like the blue tooth feature too. He's happy and I'm happy that I don't have to hear everything he is listening to. Sometimes he gives me the head phones just to enjoy the sound quality of what he's listening too. We both appreciate and enjoy that. Not cheap yet a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Christine M., Mebane NC

customer_reviews.title: This is a great headset, a bit pricey but i feel they ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great headset, a bit pricey but i feel they are worth it. Sound quality is better than any headset I've ever had. Keep in mind though I've never spent over $70.00 for a headset. The bluetooth feature is great for phones and other mobile phones. It took me awhile to get the bluetooth to work with windows 8.1. It's such a hassle that I don't even use the bluetooth feature for my laptop, I just use the wired adapter it came with. Over all great headset. Minus 1 star for making me go through that setup hell with windows 8.1
customer_reviews.author: Frank Celis

customer_reviews.title: Hear to Believe!
customer_reviews.text: This headphone is a perfect complement to my Iphone, it is worth every penny of the price I paid. This sound quality is extraordinary, I have never hear a better sound than this. Hear to believe, it is amazing. The bluetooth feature is easy to setup, and the interface is excellent! I am extremely satisfied with this purchase! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: oscaryipchau

customer_reviews.title: I literally use these headphone everyday since getting them
customer_reviews.text: These headphone have meet all my expectations. The biggest plus for me was the fact that it's able to pair with both my iPad and iPhone simulatiously. It's also very light weight so I litterally wear to to bed at with no problem. The battery last 7+ hours and way it swivels or the just the way it's built ensures that these headphones are intact even though I've sat and slept on them many time. The sound quality is good If you're not into balance and clarity vs heavy bass.
customer_reviews.author: KEVIN

customer_reviews.title: A Perfect Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with this purchase! The headphones are wonderful. I have had Dr. Dre Studio Wireless and do like the Bose much better. They fit over the ear much better, are very light and have a soft cushion. I do use these at the gym on a regular basis. The seller was very reliable with excellent communication and shipped quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Whitecotton

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recomended
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones, don't listen to the negative reviews. Volume is plenty loud for music and video. I use them both wirelessly and wired when the battery runs low. I love how they hook up to two Bluetooth devices simultaneously, I can watch a movie on my tablet and still accept a phone call. I highly recommend purchasing these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Peter H Giftos

customer_reviews.title: Good but could be better
customer_reviews.text: This are very light and comfortable. The phone function works really well. These headphones aren't very loud while using bluetooth (especially on an airplane). The button features on the bluetooth piece are pretty nice. The wired connection provides better sound quality to me. Disappointed these don't come with a hardcase.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: bose its bose
customer_reviews.text: i wouldn't call myself an audiophile. i just like what i like loud. there's no distortion . the volume is okay. i am listening to them now. i had to charge them up. they may have had a partial charge. there is no wall plug. the factory dude told me it was a cheap item to buy. no problem i had one. still i think that should be disclosed.
customer_reviews.author: joey

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my son. He LOVES them! Unbelievable sound quality and surprising range from his Iphone. Very glad I chose these. Honestly, I know next to nothing about bluetooth headphones but I did a lot of research and these were the best I found in the price range.
customer_reviews.author: Always looking to mimic life more closely

customer_reviews.title: Bose AE2w Bluetooth Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Bose AE2w Bluetooth Headphones - OMG! Headphone Nirvana. No boosted-bass .... just solid low-noise audio and a great microphone too; I use this with my i5S .. and it is great in both directions; I hear it very well; and I get positive comments on how I sound at the receiving end as well on my i5S.
customer_reviews.author: Barry J Bolling

customer_reviews.title: You may never go back to being wired.
customer_reviews.text: Great product from Bose. You have no idea how liberating it is not have to deal with the cord until you try it for yourself. It sounds great. Bass is deep. mids and highs are clear. Come with a cord and it sound a little better with it that in bluetooth mode. Very light. The most comfortable around-ear headphones out there.
customer_reviews.author: Cotoner

customer_reviews.title: Very good.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these headphones due to articles I read that it wasn't nice canceling but a quality sound, I have young kids and need to be able to hear them when they need me so this works just fine for me. Being blu tooth I can work out and not have to deal with them with kid gloves, they can handle abuse which I give them. Being able to cover my ears completely makes them painless for long term use unlike other headphones I have.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: find a better place to enjoy my music like lay on a ...
customer_reviews.text: I am now untethered and tangle free! Can move to the music, find a better place to enjoy my music like lay on a couch or do some work at home, while listening to my tunes! And what beautiful clear sounds! It's like being at a recording studio or at a concert listening to the music!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Koweluk

customer_reviews.title: Love them. Some people noted they weren't loud enough
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Some people noted they weren't loud enough. I must have good hearing. They are fine for me. Comfort is terrific. I listen to music or streaming video for a couple of hours & hardly know they are there on my head.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice but not for me.
customer_reviews.text: very clear sound, very light weight. I like bass, these do not produce a lot of it. They also are not loud enough for me. They would be great to listen to an audio book or or music at moderate levels but if you want to rock out look else ware.
customer_reviews.author: ron

customer_reviews.title: I see why they discontinued this product! 0 star rating
customer_reviews.text: Was a great product until the Bluetooth module failed. Under warranty they sent me another. Well that failed as well. Now I need to use the cord. Very annoying since the only reason I bought them is for the Bluetooth. They wouldn't send a third one very irritating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sound from comfortable headset.
customer_reviews.text: The sound on these are just what you would expect from Bose. They are a little hard to pair because the pairing button is not obvious. Spend a minute with the instructions and you'll have no problems.
customer_reviews.author: David Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: As long as you remember to charge these babies, they will keep you happy and entertained! I can wear them for almost a full day of entertainment before they need repowering. I swear by BOSE, the best sound quality for watching TV, listening to music, editing film or playing my bass guitar.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Duarte

customer_reviews.title: I like the clear sound that comes from this set of ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the clear sound that comes from this set of Bose headphones and the way it wraps around my ears to cancel out all the noise ! This is my second set of Bose headphones and I have looked at other headphones and in my opinion, they don't come close !,
customer_reviews.author: memere

customer_reviews.title: really nice
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this item because it arrived as expected and satisfies the need I purchased it for. I would more then likely purchase this product again or recommend it to both friends and family, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: gary

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I was skeptical at first having had some poor experiences with bluetooth devices in years past. After reading several reviews on Amazon, I ordered them and couldn't be happier. They are Bose so of course they sound great, look good, and are comfortable. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Good Headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Really good headphones. Although they are not noise cancelling they still get the job done. The fact that you can use it as wired headphones while the Bluetooth part charges is a plus. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: These headphones are absolutely wonderful. They don't hurt my ears even after wearing ...
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are absolutely wonderful. They don't hurt my ears even after wearing for hours, and are perfect for listening to Audible audiobooks while I clean the house. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: BizzyBee

customer_reviews.title: This headphone is light and comfortable to wear in long stretch of hours
customer_reviews.text: This headphone is light and comfortable to wear in long stretch of hours. The sound quality is almost excellent but I prefer the sound from the wireless Beats Studio generates more bass and it really depends on what kind of music you are listening to.
customer_reviews.author: Blue lobster

customer_reviews.title: OMG
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product! I charged it up and used it right away. I did have to look up how to connect the bluetooth. But I only had to do it once. The sound is excellent Bose Quality. I wear these all around the house and Bonus....when my iphone rings I can answer it from my headset and actually talk. This was a feature I was not aware of. I would recommend it for all ages.
customer_reviews.author: sgg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are great wireless head phones. Iv'e had no problem at all connecting and have not found there to be any delay in signal. They are comfortable to wear for extended periods. Exactly what i would expect from a BOSE product.
customer_reviews.author: Omnicare

customer_reviews.title: These headphones were amazing. I wish I could wear them all the ...
customer_reviews.text: These headphones were amazing. I wish I could wear them all the time but because of my sensitive ears, I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Ayrton F.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Great sound quality from triport speakers Easy Bluetooth pairing Good range 30ft+ Light as a feather Can wear for hours with no discomfort. Volume, stop, start, next, last track control from headset Microphone for phone calls or Skype Good sound insulation Quick charge time Decent battery life. Nice and Loud on remastered music and video with no distortion at high volume. Cons: Volume does max out on non remastered recordings. More of a source issue than the Bose themselves. A good EQ app can help here. Overall: I'm a happy camper with these headphones in use. Amazon one-day delivery service was quick and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Bluetooth Over-Ear headset out there......for the price. It is very comfortable and sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Spike Spiegel

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. The sound quality is good. Have used both Bose and Beats products that are similar-priced. Personally recommend Bose if you are looking for a better quality sound at the same price range. The bluetooth range is fairly wide, which was what I looked for. One thing I don't like about this product is that the sweat gets kinda trapped around the ear-pad area while using it working out. But probably, the same goes for other headphones. Other than that, worth every dollar I spent on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jun

customer_reviews.title: would buy again
customer_reviews.text: It is amazing how nice it is to not have a cord. Working out or house work or just doing more than one thing these headphones are great. Just don't get too far away from your source you are connected to and they work perfect. Plus if you are listening with a phone it will interrupt your music to receive the call. Like them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila H

customer_reviews.title: Superb gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought for daughter for Christmas. Great gift. She LOVES them. Can't keep them off of her head. Nice sound for Bluetooth. Much better than beats headsets.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J Suppes

customer_reviews.title: Was a bit skeptical after my great experience with Sony MDR-1RBT but these are great headphones ...
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit skeptical after my great experience with Sony MDR-1RBT but these are great headphones Pros: Very light and great sound quality. Sony were way too heavy. Battery life is decent (4-5 hrs) but not as great as Sony. Cons: Connectivity is not as strong as the Sony MDR-1RBT but words just fine in my 1br apt.
customer_reviews.author: Nandan Phadke

customer_reviews.title: Blue tooth is the worst
customer_reviews.text: The Mic of the Bluetooth dose not work properly. The volume is very low. You can't use this device in the move. Very bad for voice calls, etc. Very disappointing boss product
customer_reviews.author: Sid C

customer_reviews.title: The finest instrument in my arsenal of sound
customer_reviews.text: The finest instrument in my arsenal of sound. They are incredible. Close your eyes and the music is everywhere. You'll have to listen to all your music again, cause it won't be the same.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Bose quality we have all come to know, love and expect.
customer_reviews.text: A lightweight, comfortable and hi-end listening experience. A great value if you are looking for perfection in a bluetooth version of the Bose quality we have all come to know, love and expect.
customer_reviews.author: TPH1983

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Bose - The Mercedes of Sound. Good product. Just wish Bose could somehow combine the Noise Cancelling technology into a wireless Blue tooth headset then we would be TALKING! Jenny Fred, Va,
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer E Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I love listening to music again, I'm 56 and thought I wouldn't enjoy headphones like I did when I was younger. I was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S. Frost

customer_reviews.title: Easy to charge and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The Bose is a good item but is not very handle but the voice is crisp and does have 8 hours of battery so it keep going all day long I am glad for that and easy charge too 1:30 hour full charge
customer_reviews.author: Sam wang

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: This headset is amazing. It works with my cell phone, gaming and just about anything else bluetooth. Sound quality is very good, and microphone is good as well. I would recommend to others and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Matt H

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality sound
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality sound. Great with the iPhone and iPad.. I have not had any success with any other other Bluetooth device.
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN R COOPER

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is too short
customer_reviews.text: I liked the convenience of the blue tooth. But the battery life is so short that it is frustrating to use. I have to assure that I have the wire with me to change it out after only a couple hours.
customer_reviews.author: Ann E Jackson

customer_reviews.title: I was glad to have found the item and with a great ...
customer_reviews.text: I was glad to have found the item and with a great price. I just haven't been able to sync up with my devices.
customer_reviews.author: lorichia8

customer_reviews.title: Bose AE2W Bluetooth Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my purchase. They are WONDERFUL because I can walk around the house or anywhere near my providing bluetooth phone. Excellent sound. Very easy to use! Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I waited until i tested out a friends pair of AE2w and i must say it is absolutely the best. This was a upgrade from my old pair Bose around-ear (wired). I usually have to take them off after an hour, i can wear the AE2w for as long as the battery last without feeling pressure on my ears. Would recommend to any that feel discomfort from wearing headphones ( pulsating ear from the pressure of headphones) A+++
customer_reviews.author: Nam Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: the best of the best
customer_reviews.text: I sent this as a gift to my dad for father's day. I did not think that him wearing hearing aids would be a problem, but when he tried wearing them his aid's would have a crazy sound. So he is sending them back, but not because they are not a great unit because you get what you pay for. I wanted to get him the best because he is the best dad. I can not say anything bad about them because they worked as well as I knew they would and can't beat them for sound. Just check if someone is wearing hearing aids then they will not work with some that sound off when they get covered.
customer_reviews.author: David P Whaley

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT! BOSE HAS NO EQUAL
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT! BOSE HAS NO EQUAL! i may buy another! looks smart great sound! I have several Bose products! You see them in the NFL now!
customer_reviews.author: Skip Motes

customer_reviews.title: Really good!
customer_reviews.text: Great performance, I used firts time in a flight from Chicago to Hong Kong and it kept working for 8 hours. Good quality sound and no problems for connection.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Bose SoundLink Around-Ear Bluetooth Headphones are the best headphones for the money
customer_reviews.text: Bose SoundLink Around-Ear Bluetooth Headphones are the best headphones for the money. Superior sound and easy on the ears. They are top of the line in headphones. Need I say more?!!!
customer_reviews.author: MJS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and sound
customer_reviews.text: Bose quality and good sound. There is nothing else to be said. Although a little less on the price would be nice. American greed.
customer_reviews.author: Frog

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to wear. Great sound with option to remove blue tooth module and connect directly with wire supplied
customer_reviews.author: Ernie On Marco

customer_reviews.title: Blue tooth
customer_reviews.text: I was hopping that I could use it with my tv but couldn't get it to work. It is perfect for listing to music and using as my Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Gus Trapani

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, works without transmitter on Samsung tv
customer_reviews.text: Very clear, very easy to pair with both a Samsung 60" 8550 (4k 3d model) and with a tuner. Was told in the store that Samsung tv didn't have Bluetooth comparability but it worked perfect.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The wireless died,,, these are not noise cancelling in any way
customer_reviews.author: Bret Major

customer_reviews.title: Bose quality is amazing again
customer_reviews.text: These things are amazing. Good sound quality, decent battery life, not too heavy at all. It even comes with a cord for non-bluetooth audio devices.
customer_reviews.author: Aria Illusine

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for my husband
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these headphones. They cut out all the noise and the sound is awesome. They are great with bluetooth devices, even to switch back and forth.
customer_reviews.author: charzweb

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound
customer_reviews.text: My son was thrilled with these. The perfect graduation gift for a boy that loves to listen to his music ALL THE TIME!
customer_reviews.author: N. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fine product which can use minor improvements
customer_reviews.text: Usual high quality sound Bose is renowned for. Bluetooth connectivity is strong and reliable. With soft ear cups and cushioned headband fits snugly and can be worn for extended periods without discomfort. When connected on bluetooth, at highest volume sound is not appreciably high enough. Listening to instrumental music especially leaves one with a feeling of discontent but the convenience of wireless listening quickly compensates. Sound is significantly improved on wired connection. Single charge lasts for 2-5 days depending on use. Folding earcups to flatten headphones for carrying/traveling is appreciated as reduces cumbersomeness. Carrying case somewhat disappointing as just a drawstring bag.
customer_reviews.author: Imran Khan

customer_reviews.title: Love these! The sound is great
customer_reviews.text: Love these! The sound is great. Works great with my iPhone 6 plus. The charge lasts for quite a while. Fits nice.
customer_reviews.author: Liam's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wired connection is lacking mic. When you make the call over Bluetooth, it picks up a lot of disturbance!
customer_reviews.author: Amit Bhutani

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them, but jeez Bose, for the price couldn't you have provided a case?
customer_reviews.author: Blu

customer_reviews.title: Way too expensive
customer_reviews.text: The headphones were of good quality, the range and clarity of the Bluetooth radio were great. However, for $250, I was expecting a lot more. They just do not have the deep bass and crisp highs that I have come to know as standard Bose. I probably would have kept them for a hundred dollars less, unfortunately I just couldn't find what makes them worth their price. It's a nice product, but Bose is either trying to use this product to cover the costs of another one, or, their supply management folks are making a killing under the table.
customer_reviews.author: West_MI_Mark

product_meta.title: Bose SoundLink Around-Ear Bluetooth Headphones, Black (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description: Size:Only Bluetooth 2.0| Color:BlackSoundLink around-ear Bluetooth headphones let you enjoy immersive Bose sound from your iPad-plus wireless freedom. Their around-ear fit stays comfortable for hours, and you can move around without being tethered to your iPad, Smartphone or other Bluetooth device. You can even connect simultaneously to two devices. Controls on the ear cup let you operate certain functions of the iPad directly from the headphones and switch to take a call on your phone. Headphones charge easily with the included USB cable, and LED and audio indicators provide power, battery life and Bluetooth connection status.
feature_bullets: Enjoy immersive sound with wireless freedom
Cushioned around-ear fit for hours of comfortable listening
Wirelessly connects to your Bluetooth devices
Rechargeable battery plays up to eight hours

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,095 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
